name: DUMBBELLS SET
description: Our dumbbells are the perfect tool to take your workout to the next level. They also provide athletes with an effective targeting tool, to work every single muscle! Dumbbells are a must have for any gym environment, home gym and commercial alike. Add the WOW factor to your gym with these great rubber Hex Dumbbells!
features: Suitable for home and commercial gyms

name: CYCLE TRAINER
description: This is a refurbished model that we have in perfect working order. Our customer is upgrading their equipment and have taken these bikes in. The bikes come with a 3-month warranty.
features: V-shaped frame to accommodate riders of all body shapes and sizes.
Magnetic resistance for a smooth and quiet workout.
Rear-wheel design for protection from sweat and corrosion.Transport wheels for ease of transport.
Standard computer displaying power output in Watts

name: YOGA MAT
description: Yoga mats are a must for any gymgoer or yoga enthusiast! This is a vital tool to get the best out of your workout. Our yoga mats create a comfortable barrier between the user and the floor below, taking away any pressure that could otherwise be felt from exercising solely on the ground.

name: WEIGHT-PLATES
description: Strength train with tailored weight for your individual fitness level and needs with these Black Bumper Plates. Adjust the resistance level at any time by adding and removing the plates on your bar. Meet your goals of defining or building muscle also. These bumper plates can be used for a variety of exercises. These include targeted arm workouts, squats and crunches.
features: Adjustable to your individual fitness level
Suitable for home and commercial gym use.

name: KETTLE BELL
description: A great addition to any strength and weight training routine, Cast Iron Kettlebells are a versatile piece of equipment. Moreover, they can be used for a diverse combination of workouts. Examples include squats, lunges, crunches and presses giving the fitness user a full body workout.
features: Boost cardio stamina and muscular endurance
Variety of exercises including squats, lunges, crunches

name: TREADMILL
description: The Bolt Z5 has proven to be a fantastic addition to the Bolt Cardio Range and is very popular amongst Commercial Customers like Gyms and Sports Clubs. With the option for both Touchscreen or Keypad this treadmill has all the specs you need!

name: ELLIPTICAL MACHINE
description: This ELLIPTICAL MACHINE was returned to us by a client and has since been fully serviced by our in-house engineer. Selling at a fraction of its retail price this top of the range, commercially graded spin bike is a steal! It comes with a 6-month warranty.

name: CROSS TRAINER
description: The Precor AMT adaptive cross-trainer is ideal for a commercial gym or home gym. This cross trainer is almost brand new and has been used very little.
features: Capacitive touch screen for responsive and intuitive workout control
Motion controls to alter movement and resistance with ease
Head-up viewing angle for correct, effective posture and comfort
Featured workouts to encourage users to try more variety in their routines

name: SKIPPING ROPE
description: Speed ropes are an ideal tool to help with cardio and stamina. Commonly used by athletes, for sports such as boxing, Speed Ropes help to increase stamina while keeping the user light on their feet and constantly moving. Speed Ropes are an ideal piece of equipment for any fitness conscious person as they are portable and can be used virtually anywhere and are also extremely easy to store meaning that they will not take up any space in a gym or home. The Speed rope is highly durable to last constant use and also turns with incredible ease allowing for maximum results.

name: POWER BANDS
description: Take your weight-training to the next level with a Resistance Power Band by both increasing muscular endurance and improving coordination. Moreover, these high strength Resistance Power Bands are unique. They also offer a constant resistance, which intensifies the workout by challenging more muscle groups as you build strength.
features: Adaptable to all fitness levels (Beginner, Rehabilitation & Experienced)
Ideal for assisted pull-ups, stretching and lower leg exercises
Applicable for use with or without weights

name: SLAM BALL
description: Slam Balls are an effective way to increase the intensity of your daily workout regime. By design, the Slam Balls are to be thrown against the walls or floor to build explosive strength. However this versatile tool can also be used like a traditional medicine ball. Used when undertaking squats, lunges and sit-ups, the slamball helps to engage muscle groups and build strength and muscle stamina. The strong interior filling is substantial to maintain the shape of the ball through repeated impact making it ideal for commercial gym use. The limited storage requirements of the Slam Ball also make it an ideal addition to your home gym.
features: Suitable for home and gym use

name: BOXING GLOVES
description: The Adidas Hybrid 200 is a great intermediate boxing glove. It is made with genuine buff leather with a PU inner for the users comfort. The Hybrid 200 can be used for sparring and bag work and is available in two different sizes (14oz and 16oz).
features: Leather palm/thumb, outside area is PU.
